title: A police officer rescued people from fire in the Sverdlovsk Region (The Ministry of Internal ...
text: ( Source : The Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation ) Timely and operational measures taken by the police officer and his friend allowed to avoid human casualties in the fire of two houses in the city of Tavda . On October 15 ,
